description: Learn to build complete, modern web applications from scratch using the most in-demand technologies. This course teaches everything from responsive UI design to backend API development. You will work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node, Express, and MongoDB step by step. Every module includes hands-on practice and real-world projects for a strong portfolio. By the end, you’ll confidently create, deploy, and manage full-stack applications.
classDetails: Week 4: ES6, Fetch API, Async JS

description: This beginner-friendly course takes you from zero experience to writing your own Python programs. You will learn core concepts like variables, loops, conditions, functions, and modules in a simple and practical way. Every topic includes examples that help you understand how Python works in real life. You will build small automation projects to strengthen your skills. By the end, you will be ready for advanced Python, data science, or web development.
classDetails: Week 4: File Handling + Final Mini Project

description: This course helps you master React by going deep into hooks, state management, and performance optimization. You’ll learn how React works under the hood and how to write efficient, scalable components. Key topics include Context API, memoization, custom hooks, and advanced routing. Every session includes practical coding challenges to improve your confidence. By the end, you'll be able to build and optimize professional React applications.

skillName: Node.js and Express REST API Development
description: Learn how backend systems work by building secure and scalable REST APIs with Node.js and Express. You will understand routing, middleware, authentication, database integration, and error handling. MongoDB will be used to implement real CRUD operations with proper data structures. Each module includes hands-on tasks that help you learn API development practically. By the end, you’ll confidently create, test, and deploy backend services.

This course teaches you how to build modern, beautiful mobile apps for Android and iOS using Flutter. You will learn Dart programming, widgets, layouts, navigation, and state management. Practical tasks and real app-building sessions help you understand how mobile development works. You’ll also work with Firebase for authentication, database, and cloud integration. By the end, you will publish your own mobile app on the Play Store.
classDetails: Week 5: Building a Full Mobile App
Week 6: Publish on Play Store + Final Project

skillName: Data Science and Machine Learning with Python
description: This course gives you a complete foundation in data analysis and machine learning using Python. You will work with NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn to analyze real datasets. Topics include data cleaning, visualization, modeling, and evaluation techniques. You will build multiple ML models such as regression and classification with hands-on practice. By the end, you'll have strong real-world data science skills and multiple portfolio projects.
classDetails: Week 6: Case Studies + Final ML Project

description: Learn how developers collaborate professionally using Git and GitHub. This course covers repositories, commits, branches, merges, and conflict resolution. You will understand pull requests, code reviews, and real-world version control workflows. Hands-on tasks help you practice open-source contributions and team collaboration. By finishing the course, you'll confidently use Git in any software project.
classDetails: Week 1: Git Basics & Local Repo Setup

description: This course teaches essential SQL concepts including queries, joins, indexing, and schema design. You will understand how databases store, organize, and manage data efficiently. Hands-on tasks help you practice writing optimized SQL statements. You will learn normalization, query optimization, and real-world database structures. By the end, you'll confidently design and manage MySQL databases.

Learn modern DevOps workflows using Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and automation tools. You will understand how containers work and how to set up automated deployment systems. Topics include GitHub Actions, Docker Hub, pipeline creation, and environment optimization. Hands-on projects help you build real DevOps setups used in the industry. By the end, you'll be able to automate builds, tests, and deployments like a DevOps engineer.
classDetails: Week 3: GitHub Actions + Final DevOps Project

skillName: Problem Solving and Data Structures in C++
description: This course helps you master problem-solving and data structures using C++. You will learn arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, recursion, and dynamic programming. Every lesson includes algorithm techniques used in programming contests and interviews. You will solve structured problems to improve logic, speed, and thinking ability. By the end, you will become confident in writing efficient and optimized code.
classDetails: Week 1: Arrays, Linked Lists, Stack, Queue
Week 4: Recursion, DP + Final Coding Project
